errors.reasoning: First-mover advantage on critical bug fix (synthetic tool_result handling). Strong endorsement from CONTRIBUTOR (rodbland2021) who independently implemented same fix and explicitly declared this PR superior among 10+ duplicates. MEMBER (sebslight) participation. Agents category (high merge volume). Small scope (3 files). Maintainer-validated solution.

Gateway + agents categories. Size L. However: single closing comment from 'Takhoffman' (CONTRIBUTOR, not MEMBER) saying 'Closing with Tak approval' is ambiguous phrasing - could indicate approval or closure. Low author merge rate is red flag, but technical scope (hook implementation) is core infrastructure. Confidence moderated by author history and closure ambiguity.

Supersedes #16177 (clean branch reopen). Member engagement (thewilloftheshadow) with architectural clarification. Multi-label (bluebubbles, discord, gateway, agents) indicates cross-concern fix. XL scope (53 files) is risky, but member engagement + greptile review + active discussion suggest quality. Author has 18.2% prior merge rate (below average but not disqualifying).

Gateway category, size: S (favorable). First-time contributor (0 prior) BUT demonstrates strong engagement: addressed Greptile feedback with 4 comments, implemented DNS pinning + error sanitization, responsive to review. Security hardening feature (responseUrl callback). Only blocker is auto-labeler permission issue (repo-side, not PR fault). Size + engagement + security feature + iterative fixes suggest merge.

Despite 2x formal-models-conformance-drift warnings (informational, non-blocking), Raynos comment provides context suggesting truncation values can be kept. Comprehensive review from copilot-pull-request-reviewer. Strategic bootstrap prompt change with deliberate opt-in default.

Size XS (historically strong merge rate). Channel: slack (top component area, 347 PRs, stable). Has 5 prior PRs (moderate author history) with 0 merged (0.0% rate). XS with 0 files changed is unusual (possibly metadata-only). No comments or reviews yet. Positive: channel label + XS size. Negative: no prior merges, no engagement. Borderline.

Maintainer (sebslight) comment explicitly states: 'Reverted in 65fa529e0 (reverts merge commit). This PR was an accidental merge; reverting to restore prior WhatsApp behavior.' This PR was accidentally merged then explicitly reverted by maintainer. Definitive closure signal due to being reverted.

Size XS (2 files, web-ui fix for sessions list auto-refresh after deletion). Simple, focused change. BUT: author (npmisantosh, NONE association) is first-time contributor. Critical issue identified: '6 failing tests' in unrelated `src/infra/heartbeat-runner`. Author claims tests are unrelated and failing due to `suppressToolErrorWarnings: false` mismatch, but this indicates PR may have broken test assumptions or requires broader context. Greptile review present. High engagement (2 reviews). However, test failures + first-time contributor + web-ui component (lower priority than agents/gateway) suggests likely closure pending test fix or rebase.

Strong author signal: MisterGuy420 has 57.1% merge rate (4/7 prior PRs), well above 24% baseline. Has 'trusted-contributor' label (rare, 96 PRs total in dataset). Agents category (top). Size S (favorable). Multiple Greptile reviews (6 comments across 2 passes). Moderate complexity (6 files, OpenAI-compatible APIs). No approval yet but strong author track record + label suggests path to merge.
